name: Halloween Rhythm
description:
This is a Chiptune Rhythm game for Halloween aficionados everywhere! Six spooky songs with two difficulty settings. The easy mode has you controlling a witch as she collects pumpkins to the beat. Hard mode will test your reflexes as you move the little witch's wand in rhythm.

  • Saint-Saëns – Danse Macabre
  • Paul Dukas - The Sorcerer's Apprentice
  • Richard Wagner - Ride of the Valkyries
  • Mussorgsky – Night on Bald Mountain
  • Giuseppe Verdi - Dies Irae from his Requiem
  • Chopin – “Funeral March” from his Piano Sonata No. 2

[How to Play]
You must hit the notes at the right time

[Main Menu]
Left click....................................Choose a game

[Normal Mode]
Up/Down Arrow......................Move up or down
Spacebar....................................Toggle Pause

[Hard Mode]
Left/Right Arrow...................Move left or right
Spacebar..................................Toggle Pause

[Pause Mode]
Spacebar..................................Toggle Pause
Left click..................................Choose to resume playing or go to Main Menu

Technical Background
After seven years programming in Python and Javascript, this year I decided to take a leap of faith and make games in C++. The learning was not as bad as I expected. As I chose to use SFML instead of a game engine, this decision has forced me to consider every aspect of this game in detail. I hope you have as much fun playing this game as I had creating and testing it! :)
